description:
THE PROPERTY
This outstanding property, with approved plans and permits for 6 luxurious units, beckons buyers with the fortitude to bring an incredible opportunity to fruition. Set in a prime position that attracts buyers in every stage of life, this is the ideal place to set these new property plans in motion.

Currently onsite is an original 3-bedroom brick residence with double carport that opens options for immediate rental while this project gets underway. Boasting a sprawling 724sqm (approx.) allotment that will become home to 4 triple-storey and 2 double-storey townhouses, this property's immense revenue potential is already sealed.

This is an unparalleled opportunity to capitalise on a large block in a key lifestyle location. Don't delay, plan your viewing today.

THE FEATURES
• Approved plans and permits for 6 spectacular townhouses
• 4 triple-storey and 2 double-storey home designs
• Building documents are ready
• Generous 724sqm (approx.) allotment
• Rent out or reside in the current 3-bedroom brick home
• Highly sought-after family-friendly neighbourhood
• Coveted public school zone near several elite private schools

THE LOCATION
Securing a prized position near endless amenities ensures this is a premier acquisition. Close to bus transport, Wantirna Mall, Westfield Knox, and Eastlink, there is an enviable ease to living here. For families, proximity to Regency Park Primary School, Wantirna College, Swinburne TAFE, and private schools including The Knox School and St Andrew's Christian College is a major drawcard.
